thread.section_title: Jose Mourinho speaks out over Manchester United’s interest for ‘absurd’ Neymar – Metro
thread.title: Jose Mourinho speaks out over Manchester United’s interest for ‘absurd’ Neymar
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho speaks out over Manchester United’s interest for ‘absurd’ Neymar

author: Tom Olver
title: Jose Mourinho speaks out over Manchester United’s interest for ‘absurd’ Neymar
text:
Neymar is reportedly wanted by Manchester United (Picture: Getty) Jose Mourinho has spoken out amid speculation Manchester United are lining up a sensational move for Neymar in the summer transfer window.
Alexis Sanchez gives Chelsea major hope with latest interview on Arsenal future Neymar has scored 99 goals in 172 appearances for Barcelona since making his debut for the Catalan giants back in 2013 but the 25-year-old has been heavily linked with the Red Devils in recent weeks.
Reports suggest United are prepared to meet the Brazilian’s mammoth £173million release clause but Jose Mourinho has played down their chances of landing the Barca superstar.
Speaking to ESPN Brasil, Mourinho said: ‘I always try to be objective and pragmatic with the clubs and ask the clubs for what can be given to me. Neymar is absurd.
Jose Mourinho has tipped Neymar for greatness (Picture: Getty) ‘A club like Barcelona can not and will not lose Neymar.
‘Although [Lionel] Messi is still a young player with years to go, he is still playing well at the age of 30, and Neymar will be Barcelona’s great player after Messi.
More: Football Hector Bellerin tells Barcelona he wants to leave Arsenal in secret London meeting 
Manchester United target two goalkeepers as David De Gea's replacement 
Arsene Wenger delivers final decision to Arsenal board over his future 
‘It is like trying to crack a safe. I think it’s impossible.’
MORE: Deal: Ex-PSG midfielder agrees to join Manchester United
